entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 7:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
